query.default: select * from litiko_ApprSheetOrd temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by RowIndex

query.mssql: create table {0} ([RowIndex] int NOT NULL, [JobTitle] nvarchar(max), [SignerName] nvarchar(max), [SignResult] nvarchar(max), [Comment] nvarchar(max), [Signature] nvarchar(max), [Date] nvarchar(max), [ReportSessionId] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL)
query.postgres: create table {0} (RowIndex int NOT NULL, JobTitle citext, SignerName citext, SignResult citext, Comment citext, Signature citext, Date citext, ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL)
